name: Megaroid City
desc: You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except Fusion Monsters (even if this card leaves the field). You can target 1 other card you control; destroy it, and if you do, add 1 "roid" card from your Deck to your hand. If your "roid" monster battles, during damage calculation: You can send 1 "roid" monster from your Deck to the GY; switch the original ATK and DEF of your battling monster during that damage calculation only. You can only use each effect of "Megaroid City" once per turn.
